item.title: Email sent to Harry's Shave Club today!
item.description: Yes, I sent an email to Harry’s Shave Club today! Being close to technology is a blessing and a curse sometimes. You start seeing ways to improve the user experience in everything you touch and you feel compelled to make the world a better place. So “yes” - you’ve heard it. I am a member of Harry’s Shave Club. I got tired of buying those expensive store brand razors that starts with a “G”.
